name: Pokey!
description:
OPEN THE DOORS TO SAVE YOUR BELOVED!

A cruel and slightly degenerate wizard has locked princess Gisele in 'POKEY', his diabolical dungeon. He cast a spell on the doors and the walls, and worse than that, all the natural elements were unleashed!

KNIGHT, YOU HAVE THE KEY. WILL YOU TRY TO SAVE HER?

There are 100 levels including 20 items to pick up in an astounding medieval atmosphere.  A unique play with a single click!

GAME INSTRUCTIONS

  • JUMP

[ Click ]  or  [ Spacebar ] 

  • OPEN MENU AND NAVIGATION

[ Click on the castle icon ]  or  [ ESC , Spacebar , ← , → , ↑ , ↓ ] 

  • RESET DATAS

Hold the click button on the castle icon inside the items page or the levels pages.

/// Team ///

Alexandre So : Code, sprites, game & level design

Sébastien Lasserre : General graphx, sprites, sound, game & level design


www.gozotronic.com
